reviewText: One of the best exercise DvDs I've tried.

It's hard to do but eventually you get it.
It doesn't take long for her to get you in shape.
I cursed her out a lot but she is encouraging.

For those who don't know Marta,let me introduce you to her.she is a great trainer from South Beach FLA.This is one of a three part series of workouts that she  promises to get you on shape in only 20 minutes a day. The good part is if you want challenge you can do them all together 'cause you will get a different workout every time. You will not be disapointed with her,the set and models are inspiring enough for you to get in shape. Get them all three,small budget and a million dollar body,don't you think is worth it?
